text: Björn Gustaf von Sydow (born 26 November 1945) is a Swedish politician. He was the speaker of the Riksdag from 2002 to 2006. He is a member of the Swedish Social Democratic Party. He had been Minister of Defence in Göran Persson's government between 1997 and 2002.Press release from the Riksdag , 2 October 2006 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Riksdag
title: Björn von Sydow
